name: MIGHT (itch)
description:
After a long time of development Might_1..0..0 is out. This version really sucks. So there will be an update soon to MIGHT_1.0.5. There will be more features added in the new version. I'm really sorry on the version is just for Windows. In the next Update, it will be available for Linux and MAC too. Do you wonder where Might's name came from and the relation of might with this game? Move and fight is what you can do in this game, so MOVE&FIGHT = MIGHT. 

GAME CONCEPT

Two Epic gamers fighting for their joysticks stolen by the opposite guy. Who Will Win. Use Up Arrow

Killing the other player does not cause you to win,

touching the joystick causes you to win. Red Player needs to touch the red joystick and the yellow player needs to touch the yellow joystick.

HOW TO PLAY Red Player 

Use w to jump, a to move right, d to move left, and use space to shoot

Yellow Player 

Use Up Arrow to jump, Right Arrow to move right, Left Arrow to move left, and use Right ctrl to shoot.
